Test Page for Link Parentheses Issue

This page tests the fix for QTBUG-69756 where parentheses in link text cause premature link termination.

Test cases:

  • Q(Gui)Application
  • Text with (parentheses) in the middle
  • (Starting with parentheses)
  • Ending with (parentheses)
  • Multiple (sets) of (parentheses)
  • Normal text without parentheses

All of the above links should be fully hyperlinked, including the text within parentheses.
